special.name: Thunderbolt
special.effect: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

special.name: Dark Pulse
special.effect: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

special.name: Bubble
special.effect: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokémon. This may also lower their Speed stat.

special.name: Air Slash
special.effect: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

special.name: Aurora Beam
special.effect: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

special.name: Flamethrower
special.effect: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

special.name: Gust
special.effect: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

special.name: Razor Wind
special.effect: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

special.name: Thunder
special.effect: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

special.name: Clear Smog
special.effect: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.

special.name: Psybeam
special.effect: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

special.name: Psywave
special.effect: The target is attacked with an odd psychic wave. The attack varies in intensity.

special.name: Psychic
special.effect: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

special.name: Shadow Ball
special.effect: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

special.name: Absorb
special.effect: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

special.name: Swift
special.effect: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing Pokémon. This attack never misses.

special.name: Smog
special.effect: The target is attacked with a discharge of filthy gases. This may also poison the target.

special.name: Solar Beam
special.effect: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

special.name: Sonic Boom
special.effect: The target is hit with a destructive shock wave that always inflicts 20 HP damage.

special.name: Fire Blast
special.effect: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. This may also leave the target with a burn.

special.name: Thunder Shock
special.effect: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

special.name: Tri Attack
special.effect: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.

special.name: Night Shade
special.effect: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

special.name: Surf
special.effect: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

special.name: Scald
special.effect: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

special.name: Heat Wave
special.effect: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with a burn.

special.name: Confusion
special.effect: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

special.name: Hydro Pump
special.effect: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

special.name: Hyper Beam
special.effect: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

special.name: Petal Dance
special.effect: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

special.name: Bubble Beam
special.effect: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target. This may also lower its Speed stat.

special.name: Ember
special.effect: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

special.name: Blizzard
special.effect: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.

special.name: Sludge
special.effect: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

special.name: Sludge Bomb
special.effect: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. This may also poison the target.

special.name: Fire Spin
special.effect: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

special.name: Dazzling Gleam
special.effect: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

special.name: Water Gun
special.effect: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

special.name: Mirror Coat
special.effect: A retaliation move that counters any special attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

special.name: Moonblast
special.effect: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

special.name: Bug Buzz
special.effect: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

special.name: Mega Drain
special.effect: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

special.name: Dream Eater
special.effect: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.

special.name: Acid
special.effect: The opposing Pokémon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.

special.name: Flash Cannon
special.effect: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it all at once. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

special.name: Dragon Rage
special.effect: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

special.name: Dragon Pulse
special.effect: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

special.name: Ice Beam
special.effect: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. This may also leave the target frozen.

special.name: Iron Tail
special.effect: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

special.name: Aqua Jet
special.effect: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

physical.name: Dig
physical.effect: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.

physical.name: Thrash
physical.effect: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

physical.name: Cut
physical.effect: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

physical.name: Foul Play
physical.effect: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the move's power.

physical.name: Rage
physical.effect: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

physical.name: Super Fang
physical.effect: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

physical.name: Rock Throw
physical.effect: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

physical.name: Rock Slide
physical.effect: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing Pokémon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pokémon flinch.

physical.name: Double Slap
physical.effect: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

physical.name: Strength
physical.effect: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

physical.name: Counter
physical.effect: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

physical.name: Bide
physical.effect: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

physical.name: Crunch
physical.effect: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

physical.name: Bite
physical.effect: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

physical.name: Thunder Punch
physical.effect: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

physical.name: Facade
physical.effect: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

physical.name: Karate Chop
physical.effect: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

physical.name: Clamp
physical.effect: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

physical.name: Constrict
physical.effect: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target's Speed stat.

physical.name: Brick Break
physical.effect: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

physical.name: Leech Life
physical.effect: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

physical.name: Slash
physical.effect: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

physical.name: Crabhammer
physical.effect: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

physical.name: Outrage
physical.effect: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

physical.name: Low Kick
physical.effect: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

physical.name: Ice Shard
physical.effect: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

physical.name: Sky Attack
physical.effect: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

physical.name: Submission
physical.effect: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

physical.name: X-Scissor
physical.effect: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

physical.name: Earthquake
physical.effect: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokémon around it.

physical.name: Lick
physical.effect: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

physical.name: Self-Destruct
physical.effect: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

physical.name: Bind
physical.effect: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

physical.name: Play Rough
physical.effect: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

physical.name: Fissure
physical.effect: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

physical.name: Headbutt
physical.effect: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

physical.name: Double-Edge
physical.effect: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

physical.name: Fly
physical.effect: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.

physical.name: Tackle
physical.effect: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

physical.name: Explosion
physical.effect: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

physical.name: Waterfall
physical.effect: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

physical.name: Slam
physical.effect: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

physical.name: Twineedle
physical.effect: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

physical.name: Egg Bomb
physical.effect: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

physical.name: Barrage
physical.effect: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

physical.name: Seismic Toss
physical.effect: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

physical.name: Peck
physical.effect: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

physical.name: Horn Attack
physical.effect: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

physical.name: Horn Drill
physical.effect: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

physical.name: Wing Attack
physical.effect: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

physical.name: Vine Whip
physical.effect: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

physical.name: Quick Attack
physical.effect: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

physical.name: Poison Jab
physical.effect: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

physical.name: Poison Sting
physical.effect: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

physical.name: Spike Cannon
physical.effect: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

physical.name: Take Down
physical.effect: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

physical.name: Jump Kick
physical.effect: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

physical.name: High Jump Kick
physical.effect: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

physical.name: Dragon Tail
physical.effect: The target is knocked away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

physical.name: Drill Peck
physical.effect: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

physical.name: Drill Run
physical.effect: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

physical.name: U-turn
physical.effect: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

physical.name: Double Kick
physical.effect: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

physical.name: Fake Out
physical.effect: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

physical.name: Pay Day
physical.effect: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

physical.name: Body Slam
physical.effect: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

physical.name: Superpower
physical.effect: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

physical.name: Guillotine
physical.effect: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

physical.name: Vice Grip
physical.effect: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

physical.name: Pound
physical.effect: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

physical.name: Razor Leaf
physical.effect: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing Pokémon. Critical hits land more easily.

physical.name: Power Whip
physical.effect: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the like to harshly lash the target.

physical.name: Scratch
physical.effect: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

physical.name: Hyper Fang
physical.effect: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

physical.name: Dizzy Punch
physical.effect: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

physical.name: Sucker Punch
physical.effect: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

physical.name: Feint
physical.effect: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

physical.name: Stomp
physical.effect: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

physical.name: Flare Blitz
physical.effect: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This may leave the target with a burn.

physical.name: Bone Club
physical.effect: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

physical.name: Bonemerang
physical.effect: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice—coming and going.

physical.name: Fire Punch
physical.effect: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

physical.name: Wrap
physical.effect: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

physical.name: Pin Missile
physical.effect: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

physical.name: Fury Attack
physical.effect: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

physical.name: Fury Swipes
physical.effect: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

physical.name: Mega Kick
physical.effect: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

physical.name: Mega Punch
physical.effect: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

physical.name: Megahorn
physical.effect: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

physical.name: Ice Punch
physical.effect: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

physical.name: Skull Bash
physical.effect: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

status.name: Double Iron Bash
status.effect: Double Iron Bash inflicts damage and has a 30% chance of causing the target to flinch, hitting the target twice per use.

status.name: Yawn
status.effect: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

status.name: Lovely Kiss
status.effect: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

status.name: Confuse Ray
status.effect: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

status.name: Encore
status.effect: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

status.name: String Shot
status.effect: The opposing Pokémon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

status.name: Screech
status.effect: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

status.name: Sing
status.effect: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

status.name: Smokescreen
status.effect: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

status.name: Mirror Move
status.effect: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

status.name: Will-O-Wisp
status.effect: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

status.name: Sharpen
status.effect: The user makes its edges more jagged, which raises its Attack stat.

status.name: Double Team
status.effect: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

status.name: Harden
status.effect: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

status.name: Disable
status.effect: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

status.name: Withdraw
status.effect: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

status.name: Shell Smash
status.effect: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

status.name: Focus Energy
status.effect: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

status.name: Spore
status.effect: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

status.name: Haze
status.effect: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

status.name: Agility
status.effect: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

status.name: Hypnosis
status.effect: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

status.name: Recover
status.effect: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

status.name: Tail Whip
status.effect: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pokémon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

status.name: Stun Spore
status.effect: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

status.name: Mist
status.effect: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

status.name: Stealth Rock
status.effect: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing Pokémon that switch into battle.

status.name: Sand Attack
status.effect: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

status.name: Kinesis
status.effect: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target's accuracy.

status.name: Growth
status.effect: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

status.name: Soft-Boiled
status.effect: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

status.name: Minimize
status.effect: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

status.name: Supersonic
status.effect: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

status.name: Quiver Dance
status.effect: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

status.name: Taunt
status.effect: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

status.name: Swords Dance
status.effect: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

status.name: Conversion
status.effect: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

status.name: Helping Hand
status.effect: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

status.name: Teleport
status.effect: Use it to flee from any wild Pokémon.

status.name: Thunder Wave
status.effect: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

status.name: Poison Gas
status.effect: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing Pokémon, poisoning those hit.

status.name: Toxic
status.effect: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

status.name: Poison Powder
status.effect: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

status.name: Acid Armor
status.effect: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

status.name: Amnesia
status.effect: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

status.name: Growl
status.effect: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing Pokémon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.

status.name: Leer
status.effect: The user gives opposing Pokémon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

status.name: Sleep Powder
status.effect: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

status.name: Rest
status.effect: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

status.name: Roost
status.effect: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

status.name: Splash
status.effect: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all.

status.name: Barrier
status.effect: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

status.name: Light Screen
status.effect: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

status.name: Bulk Up
status.effect: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

status.name: Whirlwind
status.effect: The target is blown away, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

status.name: Flash
status.effect: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy.

status.name: Glare
status.effect: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

status.name: Transform
status.effect: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

status.name: Roar
status.effect: The target is scared off, and a different Pokémon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single Pokémon.

status.name: Protect
status.effect: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

status.name: Defense Curl
status.effect: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

status.name: Substitute
status.effect: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

status.name: Calm Mind
status.effect: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

status.name: Mimic
status.effect: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

status.name: Leech Seed
status.effect: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

status.name: Metronome
status.effect: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

status.name: Meditate
status.effect: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

status.name: Reflect
status.effect: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

status.name: Reflect
status.effect: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

status.name: Nasty Plot
status.effect: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.
